title: A 2020 Election Earthquake? (Ep 1754)
description:
Is Twitter about to accept Elon’s offer? In this episode, I address the breaking news. I also address the earth-shaking new video from the 2020 election which could change everything.

News Picks:


The trailer for this new movie about the 2020 election is incredible. 

Is Twitter about to accept Elon’s offer? 


This could be a BIG problem for the Democrats in the 2022 elections. 

Wikipedia is a propaganda scheme. 


Astonishing news revelations about the growing Joe and Hunter Biden scandal.

People are fighting back against “woke” medicine.

What is happening with the Russian oligarchs?
